alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:39AM EST until January 26 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson, Washington and Wilkinson Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Oconee...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, The water level begins to flood portions of the dirt parking lot area near the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp...just upstream and rightbank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding continues in the woodlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
